content:
advertisement

If Joe Paterno sits down to dinner tonight and his wife Sue asks him when hes going to retire the 80yearold coach says hell tell her the same thing he tells everyone else PERIOD

 Paterno said yesterday during his weekly press conference PERIOD

The end of every recent regular season has brought the same rounds of questions for Paterno now in his forty-second year in charge of the Nittany Lions PERIOD

How do you feel physically

Could you coach for a few more years

Are you bothered by all the speculation about your future

This year is no different PERIOD Paterno fielded several questions yesterday about his future as the Lions head coach PERIOD But the coach says he has  right now  all he wanted to talk about was his  teams final regularseason game against Michigan State this weekend PERIOD

 Paterno said PERIOD 

But when the Lions line up against the Spartans on Saturday theres more at stake for Paterno than just a better bowl game PERIOD A Penn State win coupled with a Florida State loss this weekend would put Paterno and Florida State coach Bobby Bowden in a tie for the most career wins in the Football Bowl Subdivision PERIOD

Paterno has  PERIOD Bowden has  PERIOD

Paterno is quick to brush aside questions about records he may have set or may be on his way to breaking PERIOD After the  season opener against Florida International Paterno officially passed Amos Alonzo Stagg for the longest coaching tenure at a single school PERIOD

Paterno however says he doesnt think about that record at all PERIOD

 Paterno said after the season opener 

This years season opener was also Paternos first chance to walk through Beaver Stadiums tunnel and pace the sidelines since a broken leg kept him in the coachs box for the final two games of  PERIOD

Paterno said yesterday that his knee feels fine PERIOD The physical aspect of the job isnt difficult he says  except for Sunday mornings PERIOD The coach recalled how he felt last month waking up in the morning after a night game against Ohio State PERIOD

 the coach said with a laugh PERIOD

For now the questions are sure to continue PERIOD And for now the coach will answer them the same way PERIOD

 Paterno said PERIOD
